byline.contributor: Ian Austen contributed reporting from Ottawa.

abstract: North Korea's Supreme Court sentences Canadian pastor Rev Lim Hyeon-soo to hard labor for life; he was convicted of carrying out 'subversive plots.'
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Lim Hyeon-soo of suburban Toronto was the latest missionary convicted of subversive and “anti-state” crimes.

headline.main: North Korea Sentences Canadian Pastor to Life in Prison
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North Korea: Stiff Penalty for Canadian

snippet: The Rev. Lim Hyeon-soo of suburban Toronto was the latest missionary convicted of subversive and “anti-state” crimes.
